## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5) (currently working)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) (status: NO_FUEL)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Power network (id=5262) currently inactive

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) - no power
  - (18.5, 70.5) - no power
  - (21.5, 70.5) - no power
  - (24.5, 70.5) - no power
  - (27.5, 70.5) - no power
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, low fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, low fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, low fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, low fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, low fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, low fuel
- 5 Wooden chests at output positions (15.5,72.5) to (27.5,72.5) containing iron ore
- Power poles connecting all mining drills (currently not powered)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Placement Conflicts (continued)
- Repeated failures placing inserters at furnace positions (16.0,70.5) and (17.0,70.5)
- Verify space is available before placing inserters using get_entities_at()
- Remove existing blocking entities before placement attempts

### Distance Placement Errors (new)
- Failed to place stone furnace at (16.0,68.0) due to distance (69.86 > max 10)
- Failed to place small electric pole at (16.5,68.5) due to distance (70.46 > max 10)
- Always move within placement range (10 tiles) before attempting to place entities

### Crafting System Issues (new)
- Failed to craft long-handed inserters due to missing iron plates
- Ensure proper smelting infrastructure is operational before attempting crafts
- Verify all required ingredients are available in inventory

### Power System Problems (continued)
- Secondary power plant boiler has no fuel
- Steam engine not connected to power network
- Mining drills showing "no power" status
- Verify fuel supply to all boilers
- Check power pole connections throughout facility

### Furnace Input System (continued)
- All furnaces showing "no ingredients" status
- Verify inserter connections between chests and furnaces
- Ensure proper fuel supply to all furnaces
- Consider implementing belt-based transport system

### Entity Placement Verification (continued)
- Always check position availability before placement attempts
- Implement proper error handling for placement failures
- Verify inventory has required items before placement
